Title: Restriction bounds for the free resolvent and resonances in lossy scattering
Abstract: © 2014 The Author(s).We establish high energy L2 estimates for the restriction of the free Green's function to hypersurfaces in Rd, d≥ 1. As an application, we estimate the size of a logarithmic resonance-free region for scattering by potentials of the form V., where Rd is a finite union of compact subsets of embedded hypersurfaces. In odd dimensions, we prove a resonance expansion for solutions to the wave equation with such a potential.
